body_html:
We just pushed support for this request. Can you confirm you see it at head?
On Jul 6, 2016 6:56 AM, "Robert DiPietro" notifications@github.com wrote:

Ping :).

@jihunchoi https://github.com/jihunchoi for right now I just recommend
using tf.while_loop. The accompanying TensorArray stuff is a bit messy,
but you can create as many TensorArrays as you need, even with
different-shaped Tensors inside, bypassing the problems with the
higher-level tf.scan.

—
You are receiving this because you were assigned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#2294 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe/ABtim_sJ5I9eKySIJe-jidq9o5UiachNks5qS7QbgaJpZM4IaWN3
.

We just pushed support for this request. Can you confirm you see it at head?
On Jul 6, 2016 6:56 AM, "Robert DiPietro" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Ping :).
> 
> @jihunchoi https://github.com/jihunchoi for right now I just recommend
> using tf.while_loop. The accompanying TensorArray stuff is a bit messy,
> but you can create as many TensorArrays as you need, even with
> different-shaped Tensors inside, bypassing the problems with the
> higher-level tf.scan.
>
